====Usage notes====
The term {{lang|zh|廟}} is primarily used for the temples of {{w|Chinese folk religion|traditional deities}} who rank fairly low in the celestial hierarchy. The temples of higher-ranking gods, such as {{w|Mazu}} after her elevation to the "Queen of Heaven" by the {{w|Qing dynasty}}, are usually known as {{zh-l|宮|palace}}.
